Variables
  x1 in [-1 , 1];
  x2 in [-1 , 1];

Constraints
abs(1/(x1+2*x2+4)-(+(0.2810155615323)+(-0.1171458077034)*(x2^(1))+(0.05792815994964)*(x2^(2))+(-0.02216246812478)*(x1^(1))+(0.1423792443589)*(x1^(1))*(x2^(1))+(-0.1487883875979)*(x1^(1))*(x2^(2))+(-0.008750838657122)*(x1^(2))+(-0.08211573443755)*(x1^(2))*(x2^(1))+(0.09885626145252)*(x1^(2))*(x2^(2)))) >=0.05835921350013;
end
